page.title: 13Recreation Ground
page.content: The rec. is used for lots of things. It is used for fetes and other things like that. The rec. is also used for sports, there is a cricket pitch, running track, tennis courts, football pitch, rounders pitch.We use the running track, football pitch and rounders pitch at school. At the rec. there are some swings, a slide, a banana swing, and a climbing frame. There is a football club and barbecue also a Youth Club, Brownies and Cubs. Over in one corner is a canter track. There is a village hall. In the hall there is a Playgroup and Keep-Fit classes. Sometimes there are meetings and Jumble Sales. Sometimes there are Country and Western dances and car boot sales.There are some dens near the tennis courts. Katrina Dyer.
